ygData.subject: Glowing stein
ygData.msgSnippet: As in test center, it s now a 1HB weap: Item Specific Charges,  Lore Item,  Magical Item, Weight : 2.5 Persona Dexterity (DEX): 5 Disease Resistance: 25
ygData.messageBody:
As in test center, it's now a 1HB weap:

Item Specific
Charges, Lore Item, Magical Item,
Weight : 2.5
Persona
Dexterity (DEX): 5
Disease Resistance: 25
Effect: Light Healing
Hit Points (HP): 10
Intelligence (INT): 10
Player Class
Bard, Cleric, Druid, Enchanter, Magician, Monk, Necromancer,
Paladin, Ranger, Rogue, Shadow Knight, Shaman, Warrior, Wizard,
Player Race
Barbarian, Dark Elf, Dwarf, Erudite, Gnome, Half Elf, Halfling, High
Elf, Human, Ogre, Troll, Wood Elf,
Weapon
Attack Speed: 43
Damage: 7

Dam not as good as Writhing Staff (9/33, -9cha, chaotic effect) & Wheel
Staff (10/100, 10int, 10hp, 10mana, wiz only), but stats wise sure to kick
ass ard. It also look like a stein when u hold it.

How abt a stein and black stone combo? WOO! ;)


Ziltus
